si91x_soc folder contains following :

Path : si91x_soc\peripheral

Peripheral examples
===============================
ADC Static Mode
Analog Comparator
Blinky
Bod
CTS
DAC FIFO
DAC Static
OPAMP
GPIO
I2C
I2S
PWM
RTC
QEI
SPI
UART
UDMA
WDT
Combined Peripheral App

ULP (Ultra Low Power Peripherals)
=================================
ULP GPIO
ULP I2C
ULP I2S
ULP IR DECODER
ULP SPI
ULP Timer
ULP UART
ULP UDMA 

DeepSleep/Wakeup with UULP (Ultra Ultra Low Power)/vbat Peripherals as Wakeup Sources
=====================================================================================
I2C DeepSleep Wakeup Without Retention
UART DeepSleep Wakeup Without Retention



Path : si91x_soc\wlan

SOC Powersave examples
===========================
Periodic Tx DeepSleep
TCP Periodic Data Powersave
TCP Tx on Periodic Wakeup
TCP Tx with Powersave
Tx on Button Wakeup
Tx on Periodic Wakeup
Wake On Wireless
Without Retention DeepSleep
aws_device_shadow_without_retention
	
Example folder contents
========================
1. 'projects' folder which has simplicity studio project files which are used to test the example.
2. 'resources' and 'readme.md' - documentaion for the example
3.  source files
